Name: Zorg The Typing Warrior
About the game: Meet Zorg, an out of it barbarian who loves loads of drinks and adventures. An indie game in which your ability to type fast is the best weapon to win. A game that enhances your skills. Zorg cutscenes. Progressive difficulty. Save the princess.
